description: Returns a list of dataset import jobs that use the given dataset. When a dataset is not specified, all the dataset import jobs associated with the account are listed. The response provides the properties for each dataset import job, including the Amazon Resource Name (ARN). For more information on dataset import jobs, see CreateDatasetImportJob. For more information on datasets, see CreateDataset.

nested_items.name: datasetImportJobs
nested_items.description: The list of dataset import jobs.

nested_items.name: datasetImportJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset import job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset import job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset import job.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the dataset import job was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the dataset import job status was last updated.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If a dataset import job fails, the reason behind the failure.

nested_items.name: importMode
nested_items.description: The import mode the dataset import job used to update the data in the dataset. For more information see Updating existing bulk data.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token for getting the next set of dataset import jobs (if they exist).
